chart_metadata.name: diskoverdata
chart_metadata.description: Diskover is used to monitor size/volumes of distributed dataset.

runAsContext.description: Elastic Search runs as root user.

capabilities.name: CHOWN
capabilities.description: Diskover and Elastic Search are able to chown files.

capabilities.name: FOWNER
capabilities.description: Diskover and Elastic Search are able to bypass permission checks for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SYS_CHROOT
capabilities.description: Diskover and Elastic Search are able to use chroot.

capabilities.name: MKNOD
capabilities.description: Diskover and Elastic Search are able to create device nodes.

capabilities.name: DAC_OVERRIDE
capabilities.description: Diskover and Elastic Search are able to bypass permission checks.

capabilities.name: FSETID
capabilities.description: Diskover and Elastic Search are able to set file capabilities.

capabilities.name: KILL
capabilities.description: Diskover and Elastic Search are able to kill processes.

capabilities.name: SETGID
capabilities.description: Diskover and Elastic Search are able to set group ID for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SETUID
capabilities.description: Diskover and Elastic Search are able to set user ID for it's sub-processes.

capabilities.name: SETPCAP
capabilities.description: Diskover and Elastic Search are able to set process capabilities.

capabilities.name: NET_BIND_SERVICE
capabilities.description: Diskover and Elastic Search are able to bind to privileged ports.

capabilities.name: SETFCAP
capabilities.description: Diskover and Elastic Search are able to set file capabilities.

capabilities.name: NET_RAW
capabilities.description: Diskover and Elastic Search are able to use raw sockets.

capabilities.name: AUDIT_WRITE
capabilities.description: Diskover and Elastic Search are able to write to audit log.

attrs.label: Size (in Gi)
attrs.description: The size of the volume quota.

attrs.label: CPU
attrs.description: CPU limit for WG-Easy.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid CPU limit formats are</br>
- Plain Integer - eg. 1</br>
- Float - eg. 0.5</br>
- Milicpu - eg. 500m

attrs.label: Memory
attrs.description: Memory limit for WG-Easy.

schema.valid_chars_error:
Valid Memory limit formats are</br>
- Suffixed with E/P/T/G/M/K - eg. 1G</br>
- Suffixed with Ei/Pi/Ti/Gi/Mi/Ki - eg. 1Gi</br>
- Plain Integer in bytes - eg. 1024</br>
- Exponent - eg. 134e6

questions.label: CPU Limit
questions.description: CPU resource limit allow  plain integer values with suffix m(milli) e.g 1000m, 100.

questions.label: Memory Limit
questions.description: Memory limits is specified by number of bytes. Followed by quantity suffix like E,P,T,G,M,k and Ei,Pi,Ti,Mi,Gi,Ki can also be used. e.g 129e6, 129M,  128974848000m, 123Mi

1.0.15.detailed_readme:
DiskOverData

DiskOver App for TrueNAS SCALE

Diskover is a sustainable file management solution for your distributed data.

Introduction

This chart is based on diskoverdata and deployed on kubernetes via helm chart

Configuration

Please refer to questions.yaml for a detailed overview on supported configurable values.
